data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,665 believers in the county of Rudraprayag the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rudraprayag, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,665 believers in Rudraprayag to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 239,635 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Rudraprayag to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Rudraprayag to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra people. Make the Valmiki (Balmiki) Chuhra people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Rudraprayag, Uttarakhand, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Rudraprayag, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Rudraprayag, Uttarakhand, India has a population of 242,300.

We estimate Rudraprayag has 2,665 people who might know Jesus, 2,940 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 236,695 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Rudraprayag.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Rudraprayag
